title: Using Rp to buy champs
body:
Shouldyou ever buy a champ with Rp??
I was stupid before and wasted all my Rp on buying champs 
I think even on sales. Don't buy any champs with Rp.

replies.body: Buying Champions with RP is worth it if you don't get to play the game often or you want specific Champs on an account quickly.

Before the price increase, I would purchase the new champ + skin bundle with rp (if I liked the skin) it was usually not much more than the skin by itself so it was like getting the champ for about 100rp. Won't be doing that now that they've increased the price of the bundle though, not worth it IMO.
I bought some of the 6300 champs, but only during sales.
I remembered before I used 975 Rp to get Astros instaed of it half price stoopid

It's a matter of preference and how much you want to expand your playable champion pool.

It's faster to buy champs with RP than with IP.
If you want to experience more of the champs in a shorter time frame then buying with RP is a good thing.
